# <a name="replying-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="e147f-102">Antwoorden in Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e147f-102">Replying in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e147f-103">EÃ©n bericht tegelijk beantwoorden:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e147f-103">To reply to one message at a time:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="e147f-104">Kies in de berichtenlijst het bericht waarop u wilt reageren.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e147f-104">In your message list, choose the message that you want to reply to.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="e147f-105">Selecteer rechtsboven in het berichtenvenster de optie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e147f-105">At the top right of the message pane, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="e147f-106">**Antwoord** of</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e147f-106">**Reply** or</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="e147f-107">**Antwoord alle**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e147f-107">**Reply all**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="e147f-108">Typ uw bericht en selecteer **Verzenden**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e147f-108">Type your message and then select **Send**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e147f-109">Ga als u alle berichten automatisch beantwoorden:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e147f-109">To automatically reply to all messages:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="e147f-110">Ga naar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e147f-110">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
<span data-ttu-id="e147f-111">**Instellingen** > Bekijk alle**automatische antwoorden** **van Outlook Settings** > **Mail** > om de instellingen voor automatische antwoorden te [openen.](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e147f-111">**Settings** > **View all Outlook Settings** > **Mail** > **Automatic replies** to open your [Automatic replies settings](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies).</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="e147f-112">Selecteer de wisselknop **Automatische antwoorden inschakelen**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e147f-112">Select the **Turn on automatic replies** toggle.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="e147f-113">Als u het selectievakje **Antwoorden alleen tijdens een periode verzenden** inschakelt, u:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e147f-113">Selecting the **Send replies only during a time period** check box enables you to:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e147f-114">Stuur alleen antwoorden wanneer u dat wilt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e147f-114">Only send replies when you choose.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="e147f-115">Als u geen tijdsperiode instelt, blijft uw automatische antwoord ingeschakeld totdat u het uitschakelt.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e147f-115">If you don't set a time period, your automatic reply remains on until you turn it off.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e147f-116">Uw agenda blokkeren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e147f-116">Block your calendar</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e147f-117">Automatisch nieuwe uitnodigingen weigeren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e147f-117">Automatically decline new invitations</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="e147f-118">Mijn vergaderingen weigeren en annuleren tijdens deze periode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e147f-118">Decline and cancel my meetings during this period</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="e147f-119">Typ in het berichtvak een bericht dat u naar mensen wilt verzenden gedurende de tijd dat u afwezig bent.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e147f-119">In the message box, type a message to send to people during the time you're away.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="e147f-120">Als u alleen antwoorden naar uw contactpersonen wilt verzenden, schakelt u het selectievakje **Antwoorden naar contactpersonen alleen verzenden** in.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e147f-120">To only send replies to your contacts, select the **Send replies to contacts only** check box.</span></span>
6. <span data-ttu-id="e147f-121">Kies **Opslaan**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e147f-121">Select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="e147f-122">Meer informatie over [automatisch doorsturen in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="e147f-122">Learn more about [automatic forwarding in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
